title: Google Android Pixel Monthly Update - June 2019
content:
Hello Pixel Community,

We have provided Android/Pixel security updates for June  2019. All Pixel devices running Android 9 will receive these software updates as part of the June OTA, which begins rolling out to users today. We encourage you to check your Android version and update with the latest features.

To find out in detail what has been updated, check out the official update here.

Overview :

Build Number:
Primary: PQ3A.190605.003
Pixel 3/Pixel 3XL (Verizon only): PQ3A.190605.004.A1
Noteable fixes:
Fixed a bootloader issue that caused some devices to get stuck during boot with "Error: Slot unbootable: Load Error"
Fixed a camera crash during video recording
Fixed a bug that caused Netflix to be stuck on Loading... media
Updated model to improve accuracy on “Ok Google”

Details of security fixes are found in this link :
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin


Thanks,
Google Pixel Support Team
